2.0.name: wordpress/superslider-menu
2.0.description: This is your Animated menu plugin that uses Mootools 1.4.5 javascript to form a multi-level collapsable menu widget in your sidebar for your categories and posts. Automatic opener upon page change. Highly configurable, theme based design, css based animations.
